mapper.select: SELECT TD.IN_CHNL_DV_CD , TD.AS_IST_OJ_NO , NVL(TD.WK_ACPTE_STAT_CD, 'N') AS WK_ACPTE_STAT_CD , NVL(TD.WK_ACPTE_DT, '00000000') AS WK_ACPTE_DT , NVL(TD.WK_ACPTE_HH, '000000') AS WK_ACPTE_HH , NVL(TD.VST_CNFMDT, '00000000') AS VST_CNFMDT , NVL(TD.VST_CNFM_HH, '000000') AS VST_CNFM_HH , TD.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD AS WK_PRGS_STAT_CD , 'N' AS RTNGD_YN , TD.CNTR_CNFM_Y AS CNTR_CNFM_Y , TD.SAMSUNG_YN_CD AS SAMSUNG_YN_CD FROM ( SELECT AC211.IN_CHNL_DV_CD /* 입력채널구분코드 */ , AC211.AS_IST_OJ_NO /* AS설치대상번호 */ , AC221.CST_SV_ASN_NO /*배정일자(접수관리)*/ , AC211.CNTR_NO /*고객년도*/ , AC211.CNTR_SN /*고객코드*/ , NVL(AC221.WK_ACPTE_STAT_CD,'N') AS WK_ACPTE_STAT_CD /*작업수락상태(수락 'Y', 그외 '')*/ , AC221.WK_ACPTE_DT /*작업수락일자 : 배송상품 수신 일시*/ , AC221.WK_ACPTE_HH /*작업수락시간 : 배송상품 수신 일시*/ , AC221.VST_CNFMDT /*방문확정일자(최초 고객센터 입력, 최종 변경 일자)*/ , AC221.VST_CNFM_HH /*방문확정시간(최초 고객센터 입력, 최종 변경 시간)*/ , AC221.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD /* 작업진행상태코드 */ , SUBSTR(T1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM,1,4) AS CNTR_CNFM_Y /* 주문확정년 */ , TRIM(P2.PD_PRP_VAL02) AS SAMSUNG_YN_CD /* 삼성제품여부코드 */ , RANK() OVER(ORDER BY AS_IST_OJ_NO DESC ) AS RN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ AC211 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ AC221 ON AC211.CST_SV_ASN_NO = AC221.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 ON AC211.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 ON AC211.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND AC211.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON T2.BASE_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD AND P1.TEMP_SAVE_YN = 'N' AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P2 ON P1.PD_CD = P2.PD_CD AND P2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD= 'SPP' AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND AC211.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND AC211.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND AC211.IN_CHNL_DV_CD IN ('1','9') AND AC211.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD LIKE '1%' ) TD WHERE RN = 1
